item.title: Configuring RDP on XUbuntu
item.description: Install xrdp 1# Install all prerequisites 2sudo apt-get install xrdp xfce4 xfce4-goodies -y 3 4# Set the session manager to xfce 5echo xfce4-session > ~/.xsession Configure startwm.sh 1# Edit the startwm.sh file 2sudo nano /etc/xrdp/startwm.sh Comment these lines out: 1#test -x /etc/X11/Xsession && exec /etc/X11/Xsession 2#exec /bin/sh /etc/X11/Xsession add these lines: 1startxfce4 Configure the firewall 1sudo ufw allow 3389/tcp Ensure user is member of ssl-cert group 1sudo adduser xrdp ssl-cert Restart xrdp 1sudo systemctl enable xrdp 2sudo systemctl start xrdp If the session exits when you login Enable MultiUser mode Fix taken from https://github.
